query.pigql: q = load "${App.Datasets.rplcm_productoropportunity_dataset.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_IsWon_Field' == "true"; q = group q by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, "value").asGrouping()}}; FINAL = foreach q generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, "value").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, "value").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_GrainAmount_Field'), 0) as 'sum_RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_GrainAmount_Field'; FINAL = order FINAL by 'sum_RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_GrainAmount_Field' desc;

q = load "${App.Datasets.rplcm_productoropportunity_dataset.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_IsWon_Field' == "true"; q = group q by ('RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}', 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Quarter${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}'); q = foreach q generate 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}' + "~~~" + 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Quarter${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}' as 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}~~~RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Quarter${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}', sum('RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_GrainAmount_Field') as 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_GrainAmount_Field', sum(sum('RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_GrainAmount_Field')) over ([ - 4.. - 4] partition by all order by ('RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}', 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Quarter${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}')) as 'last'; q = foreach q generate 'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}~~~RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Quarter${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}' as'RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}~~~RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_Opportunity_CloseDate_Field_Quarter${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}', (sum('RPLCM_ProductOrOpportunity_GrainAmount_Field') - sum('last')) / sum('last') as 'sum_QoQ'; q = offset q 4;

parameters.text: Analyze sales performance by product, source, customer, and region.
